ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2001_01_10:
I wonder... Between the two of us, who
does fortune favor more?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
I had a feeling you’d arrive soon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Could you be my key to success,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? I’ll have to
find out.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Let me give you a little something.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
Items are like cards in your hand—it’s up to
you when to play them.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
What good timing. I was hoping to give
you this.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It seems just by being around you, I find my
winning stride.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. How would you
interpret me giving you this gift?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
Could there be a catch to it? Or something
else?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
As for me, I’d be happy if you took it exactly
as it appears.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Time for a little chat, then?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Let’s hear what you have to say,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], what
sort of hand are you planning to start our
conversation off with?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2302_01_10: This is a good item. I appreciate the thought.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Man oh man... What is going on today?
I didn’t expect a gift like this!
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Pretty impressive to catch a risk-taker like
me by surprise...
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Let’s call it for now. We can continue this
another time.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
That was time well spent. Let’s chat again
sometime.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Talking with you without strategy in mind
isn’t so bad.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This soothing atmosphere isn’t making you
lose your edge, is it?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
As a risk-taker, I have to warn you that it’s
dangerous to loosen up too much.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Just one slip could cost you everything,
you know?
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
I bet there are more than a few people
who’d rather not reveal their identity or past.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
You should be careful who you cross that
line with.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
If you press the wrong person for answers,
it could even be dangerous.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I always thought the winner takes everything
and leaves nothing for the loser.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But I’ve gained a new philosophy by
spending time with you—someone who
doesn’t care about winning or losing.
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Even if someday I were to lay everything on
the line and lose it all...
ch0048_00_gima_salon/8003_0701_04_10: I might not be overcome with despair.
